sect1.title: Less-&less-version;
sect1.para: The Less package contains a text file viewer.
Less installation depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Glibc, Grep, Make, Ncurses, Sed.

sect2.title: Installation of Less
sect2.para: The meaning of the configure option:

listitem.para: --sysconfdir=/etc: This option tells the programs created by the package to look in /etc for their configuration files.

sect2.title: Contents of Less
sect2.para: Installed programs: less, lessecho and lesskey

sect2.title: Short descriptions
sect2.para: less is a file viewer or pager. It displays the contents of the given file, letting you scroll around, find strings, and jump to marks.
lessecho is needed to expand meta-characters, such as * and ?, in filenames on Unix systems.
lesskey is used to specify the key bindings for less.
